kalomaze.name: kalomaze
kalomaze.description: very based ai hub owner i think

Punch_Combo.name: Punch Combo
Punch_Combo.description: Personal attack. Deliver a basic multihit attack to the stomach.

Kalo_Ping.name: Kalo Ping
Kalo_Ping.description: Boost attack. Spam ping the opponent and use their annoyance to your advantage, gaining manoeuvrability for 1 turn.

Krill_Yourself.name: Krill Yourself
Krill_Yourself.description: Status attack. Release an innumerable amount of krills swarming the enemy, blinding them for 1 turn.

Hi_Everyone_Im_Kalomaze.name: Hi Everyone I'm Kalomaze
Hi_Everyone_Im_Kalomaze.description: Ultimate. Nothing can stop the influx of pings.

Gravitational_Debris.name: Gravitational Debris
Gravitational_Debris.description: Personal attack. Apply sideway gravity to lift debris towards the opponent.

Gravitational_Shift.name: Gravitational Shift
Gravitational_Shift.description: Boost attack. Apply harsher gravity to everything except self, attaining manoeuvrability for 2 turns.

Spaghettification.name: Spaghettification
Spaghettification.description: Status attack. Create 2 gravity fields of opposing direction and spatially stretch the opponent apart, rendering them unable to breathe for 1 turn.

Gravity_Implosion.name: Gravity Implosion
Gravity_Implosion.description: Penultimate. Create an inward gravity field in the opponent's, crushing them from the inside.

Gravitas_Impetus.name: Gravitas Impetus
Gravitas_Impetus.description: Ultimate. Paramount downwards gravity renders the opponent inescapable, paralyzing them for 2 turns.

PUSSYPUNISHER.name: PUSSYPUNISHER
PUSSYPUNISHER.description: HE PUNISHES YOUR PUSSY AND DRIVES YOU TO FUCKING INSANITY

IP_Leak.name: IP Leak
IP_Leak.description: Personal attack. Leak the opponent's public IP address.

Virtual_Private_Network.name: Virtual Private Network
Virtual_Private_Network.description: Boost attack. Improve your resistance for 3 turn using a private internet provider.

DDoS_Attack.name: DDoS Attack
DDoS_Attack.description: Status attack. Perform a denial-of-service attack on the opponent, paralyzing them for 1 turn.

Account_Phishing.name: Account Phishing
Account_Phishing.description: Penultimate. Trick the enemy into clicking a suspicious link and phish their account.

Death_Threats.name: Death Threats
Death_Threats.description: Ultimate. Threaten to unalive the opponent's loved ones, inducing panic within them for 2 turns.
